content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] kuertee UI: Boarding operation notifications
content.author: kuertee
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Краткое описание: Мод kuertee ui boarding operation notifications улучшает интерфейс и элементы HUD.

text.description:
UI: Boarding operation notifications https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1407 by kuertee
Mod effects: ============ -Adds progress notifications of boarding operations during the Infiltration and Assault phases.
